title: CB action that increases the money supply

content.question: In a country whose banking system has limited reserves, which of the following actions by the central bank increases the money supply?

choices.label: Buying government bonds on the open market
Selling government bonds on the open market

content.answer: Buying government bonds on the open market

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
